Invigilators (should be teachers by profession) i. Two invigilators per room where 20-25 candidates are seated ii. Three inivgilators for a room/hall where more than 25 and up to 50 candidates are seated iii. Four invigilators for a room/hall where more than 50 and up to 100 candidates are seated iv. For every 50 additional candidates or part there of 1 invigilator extra

Class IV employees: Electrician, Sweeper, Watchman, Water boy, and Peon as per details: 1. Electrician: ONE on the day of examination 2. Sweeper: ONE for 200 candidates for two days 3. Watchman: TWO for one day i.e. the day of the examination 4. Water Boy: One for 200 candidates for one day i.e. on the day of the examination 5. Peon: Two for an examination irrespective of number of candidates for two days
